title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, objectives, and requirements. Gather stakeholder input and document system specifications.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture for the AutoScaler system, including the following components: data ingestion and processing, usage pattern prediction, resource allocation and scaling, monitoring and alerting, user interface, and security. The architecture should consider data flow, integration points with cloud providers (AWS, Azure, GCP), scalability, fault tolerance, cost optimization, and edge cases such as high load, low resource availability, and failures in various components. Provide diagrams, documentation for the proposed architecture, including a high-level overview, detailed component diagrams, and guidelines on how to integrate with third-party APIs. Highlight any potential performance bottlenecks and propose solutions to optimize performance. The design should follow best practices for maintainability, modularity, and clean code. Since this RFC is in the REVIEW state, please provide feedback and suggest improvements as needed.

title: Data Modeling and Database Design
description: Design the database schema and data models to store and retrieve usage patterns, infrastructure configurations, scaling policies, and historical scaling events. Consider data partitioning, indexing, and caching strategies for optimal performance, scalability, and efficiency. Also, ensure the design is compatible with the eventual implementation of real-time data processing (streaming) and machine learning algorithms. Update the schema to include the necessary fields to store metadata about the scaling events, such as timestamp, duration, and impact on resource allocation.

title: Usage Pattern Prediction Module
description: Develop the AI-driven module responsible for predicting future usage patterns based on historical data and other relevant factors.

title: Resource Scaling Module
description: Develop the module responsible for scaling cloud infrastructure resources based on predicted usage patterns and cost optimization strategies.

title: User Interface and Monitoring
description: Design and develop the user interface for monitoring system performance, configuring settings, and viewing reports.

title: Infrastructure Provisioning and Deployment
description: Set up the cloud infrastructure environment and implement deployment pipelines for the AutoScaler system.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Implement security measures, access controls, and ensure compliance with relevant regulations and industry standards.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop test plans, execute functional and non-functional tests, and ensure the system meets quality standards.

title: Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation, user guides, and training materials for the AutoScaler system.
